args.name: separator
args.description: The separator to use in case of array

name: $hasVoted
description: Checks whether a user has voted a bot

args.name: user ID
args.description: The user to check for vote

name: $monthlyVotes
description: Gets total votes of the bot this month

name: $postStatsError
description: The error thrown while posting stats

name: $postedServerCount
description: The server count that was posted

name: $postedShardCount
description: The amount of shards that was posted

name: $postedShardID
description: The main shard id that was posted

name: $totalVotes
description: Gets total votes of the bot

name: $voteBotID
description: Returns the bot that was voted

name: $voteGuildID
description: Returns the guild that was voted

name: $voteIsWeekend
description: Returns whether the vote was during weekend

name: $voteQuery
description: Returns the query params used for the guild

name: $voteType
description: Returns the type of the vote (upvoted | test)

name: $voteUserID
description: Returns the user who voted the bot
